faq.title: frekuent questionz askd

QAs.question: whut iz pretender??
QAs.answer: pretender iz a sethru meanie network replazment 4 wee yu an thre d s. kittehs want to kep gaemin, so we maek it again!!

QAs.question: kan i keep my meanie network id 4 pretender?
QAs.answer: noo!!!! we don wanna keep ur senzitiv dataz!! only pretender id!!

QAs.question: how doez kitteh use pretender??
QAs.answer: pretender iz only 4 kittehz wif subzcription!! soemtimez pretender haz open betaz 4 u doe! wil be fre latr.

QAs.question: eta wen 4 gaem??
QAs.answer: gud question. kitteh haz no idea!! multiple kittehs be workin on stuffs.

QAs.question: doez pretender work on me faek gaemr!?
QAs.answer: yez! anythin that workz wif meanie network workz wif pretender. only cemu haz it tho rite now!

QAs.question: if kitteh ban'd from teh meanie network, iz still ban'd on pretender?
QAs.answer: no!! yu is not ban'd! ther is rulez tho, so yu can stil get bananad!!

QAs.question: can kitteh gaem on othr kitteh gaemin??
QAs.answer: nonO!! kitteh can only gaem on teh wee yu an thre d s! wee has wiimmfi tho!!

QAs.question: doez kitteh need hax to gaem?!
QAs.answer: yez!! kitteh needz hax to gaem. mak sure kitteh press alt f4 4 epik gaemin!!
